entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23 with temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 23 with temperature falling to minus 30 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
